thread.title: Cavani sets best PSG scoring run with stunning volley
thread.title_full: Cavani sets best PSG scoring run with stunning volley

title: Cavani sets best PSG scoring run with stunning volley
text:
0 11-Feb-2017 02:32:39 The Uruguayan's superb volley against Bordeaux meant he has now scored in six PSG games in a row for the first time since he joined the club 
Edinson Cavani has set a new personal best for scoring in consecutive Paris Saint-Germain games thanks to his brilliant strike against Bordeaux on Friday. 
STATS: Who is the best striker in Europe? 
The Uruguay international blasted in a volley from 20 yards after just six minutes at the Nouveau Stade de Bordeaux to ensure that he has now scored in each of his last six games in all competitions. 
The striker, who turns 30 on Tuesday, has also scored against Lille, Dijon, Monaco and Nantes in Ligue 1 and against Bordeaux in the Coupe de la Ligue in his impressive run. 6 - @ECavaniOfficial has scored in his last 6 games with @PSG_inside in all comps, his best ever run since he joined the club. Matador. 
He followed up his first-half effort with another fine finish shortly after half-time to take his tally to 25 goals in just 23 appearances in France's top flight this term. Related
